description: Try our easy to follow Roast Lamb With Rosemary & Gravy recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Lamb With Rosemary & Gravy Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove all but 2 tbs of the fat from the pan, reserving the juices. Place pan with juices over medium heat. Sprinkle over flour and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon, scraping base of pan. Cook for 2 minutes or until flour starts to brown. Gradually stir in stock, stirring until smooth. Increase heat to medium-high and simmer for 5 minutes or until gravy thickens. Carve lamb and serve with potatoes, steamed beans and gravy.
